item.title: Crude Wep & Shield - download
item.dc:creator: @Surfr Surfr
item.description:
@Surfr wrote:

I made a ‘crude’ weapon and shield, I’m using them as starting items for new players. I thought I would release them incase anyone wanted to do the same =]

They’re nothing special so don’t flame saying; “Z0mg dey argh t3h bor1ngezt modelZ evORRR!!!111one”

They do work perfectly in game, no little glitches or anything.

Picture.

Model files.
http://www.mediafire.com/?n7nytjzavxd

Drop files.
http://www.mediafire.com/?39bo3x5lncc

Ints.

if(i == 14162) // ItemID { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 14167; class8.anInt181 = 1670; class8.anInt190 = 600; class8.anInt198 = 1000; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 14164; class8.anInt200 = 14164; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Crude shield"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A basic shield".getBytes(); }

if(i == 14410) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 14411; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.anInt181 = 1250; class8.anInt190 = 720; class8.anInt198 = 100; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 14413; class8.anInt200 = 14413; class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Crude axe"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A basic weapon".getBytes(); }
